txt.en: Approach the Huorn who watches you

The Ent is perfectly still, but its eyes are open. You could swear that this one has an angry red gleam in his greenish eyes... or perhaps a flare of panic. It is hard to tell when his outward behaviour is so still.\n\nYou smell smoke here and see the orange glow of fire. It is not hard to guess why this Ent may be angry.
The Huorn makes no move to attack you, but regards you with interest. It is likely that you and it have the same goals, for now.
You have the sensation of recalling a memory that is not your own....
You have found another sleeping Ent in need of assistance.
Wisewood the Ent is in the north-east corner of Fangorn's eaves.\n\nYou should speak with Wisewood once more.
A Huorn stands near the White Hand encampment, watching your every move.\n\nYou should approach the Huorn cautiously.
